defaultValue: This app shows you the known active COVID-19 cases near you along with the number of deaths number recovered. The data is supplied by Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CCSE) (https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19). Other data sources include https://worldometer/coronavirus/
Most of the data is pulled from sources that update fairly frequently (every 10 minutes even). Some data, like state-level data may only be updated once a day.
If the app inaccurately detects your location, then you can set the coordinates manually below.

items.defaultValue: Make manual adjustments here. To return to default settings simply clear all values and then press 'SAVE
